tasks.label: Compile and run basic.cpp
args: copy "${file}" "${workspaceFolder}\jspwTest.cpp"; g++ "${workspaceFolder}\jspwTest.cpp" -o "${workspaceFolder}\jspwTest"; Get-Content "${workspaceFolder}\input.txt" | ./jspwTest | Set-Content "${workspaceFolder}\output.txt"; Remove-Item "${workspaceFolder}\jspwTest.exe"; Remove-Item "${workspaceFolder}\jspwTest.cpp"
